game.name: Train Simulator: Engadin Linie: Pontresina - Scuol-Tarasp Route Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: With its iconic stations and infrastructure buildings along a stunningly beautiful route, the Engadin Linie is always worth a visit. Climb on board the RhB GE 6/6 II locomotive and start serving the 17 stations along the Engadin Linie, waiting for you to master them all!
game.shortDescriptionEn: With its iconic stations and infrastructure buildings along a stunningly beautiful route, the Engadin Linie is always worth a visit. Climb on board the RhB GE 6/6 II locomotive and start serving the 17 stations along the Engadin Linie, waiting for you to master them all!
